description: Updates an email template. Email templates enable you to send personalized email to one or more destinations in a single operation. For more information, see the Amazon SES Developer Guide. You can execute this operation no more than once per second.

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description: The content of the email, composed of a subject line and either an HTML part or a text-only part. TemplateName (string) --- The name of the template. You use this name when you send email using the SendTemplatedEmail or SendBulkTemplatedEmail operations. SubjectPart (string) --- The subject line of the email. TextPart (string) --- The email body that is visible to recipients whose email clients do not display HTML content. HtmlPart (string) --- The HTML body of the email.
